722550.name: Waiting For the Loop Official Soundtrack and EP
722550.description:
With its three dark electronic tracks, ThreeSixNine (Waiting for the Loop), is full of pulsing ambient synths that further tells the story of Waiting For The Loop extending the question, What is AI? Remixed featuring samples of dialog from the game, the EP takes the listener on a journey as if they are an AI being created, iterated, and destroyed.

Soundtrack tracklist (MP3):

Line 1 (3:59)
Line 2 (1:36)
Line 3 (3:48)


EP tracklist (MP3):

Three (4:07)
Six (2:03)
Nine (3:32)
